adrFormatAddress: 1461 1st Ave. #280, New York, NY 10075-2201, USA

originalText.text: Unequivocally the kindest and best veterinarian we have ever encountered. I can’t even specify all that she has done for our animals over the years we’ve known Dr Bressler, because she has gone so far above and beyond that I fear I’d be indirectly volunteering her for special services. She’s a great doctor and a great human being.

text.text: Unequivocally the kindest and best veterinarian we have ever encountered. I can’t even specify all that she has done for our animals over the years we’ve known Dr Bressler, because she has gone so far above and beyond that I fear I’d be indirectly volunteering her for special services. She’s a great doctor and a great human being.

originalText.text: I met Dr Bressler in the Hamptons when my dog was really sick. She came to my home in Sag Harbor at midnight when he was critically ill. All of the other animal hospitals were closed or far away. We didn’t want to bring him to the hospital because we weren’t allowed inside with him because of Covid-19. Dr Bressler and her team stayed overnight with my dog and treated him until he was feeling better. Her team was compassionate, professional, caring and loving to my dog. I was so happy that he could be treated at home. I highly recommend her to anyone who wants to be with their dog while they are sick. She was responsive to all of my questions and text messages. She always called me back and spent a lot of time reassuring me and my family. Thank you Dr Bressler!!

originalText.text: Incompetent veterinary practicing medicine through illegal means. Clients sent home with HAND-WRITTEN medication labels with insufficient information (no doctor, no clinic name, no concentration) written in literal sharpie. Referring clinics cannot get in touch with any employees, no receptionist to answer phones; we’ve been waiting over a month for critical case records from this clinic.

originalText.text: The absolute worst , completely unreliable , doesn't answer phone calls , doesn't respond to e mails , unprofessional and inconsiderate.
